title: Digital Marketing
description: The digital marketing course at CADD Manchester covers SEO, social media, email marketing, and analytics, equipping you to boost online presence and enhance career opportunities.

title: Social Media Marketing
description: Learn how to manage social media platforms effectively and create campaigns that drive results.

title: SEO Mastery
description: Master SEO techniques and tools to improve website rankings and attract more organic traffic.

title: Analytics for Business
description: Learn how to use analytics tools to make data-driven decisions and boost your business performance.
